suite.name: PaBot-IOS-Device-Loop-Runner-Examples

test.name: PARALELL IOS APP LOOP TEST - Run the IOS Wikipedia app tests in a loop while recording it and taking screenshots.

kw.name: Open Existing Default Installed IOS App
Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Run IOS Wikipedia App Test Steps In A Loop
Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.arg: Run IOS Wikipedia App Test Steps In A Sequence
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Repeat Keyword
kw.arg: Run IOS Wikipedia App Test Steps In A Sequence
kw.doc: Executes the specified keyword multiple times.

kw.name: Run IOS Wikipedia App Test Steps In A Sequence
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Switch To Landscape Back To Portrait Tap Next Button
Check Landscape Mode Take Screenshot Then Go Back To Portrait Mode
Landscape
kw.doc: Set the device orientation to LANDSCAPE

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Portrait
kw.doc: Set the device orientation to PORTRAIT

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Quit Application
kw.doc: Quit application. Application can be quit while Appium session is kept alive. This keyword can be used to close application during test case or between test cases.

suite.doc: Simple IOS app examples using AppiumLibrary and PaBot.
